title: Woops! Moxie Shorts deadline is tomorrow, not today!
body: In my last blog post, I mistakenly said that the final day to turn in your short film was today, the 19th, but I was wrong... it's tomorrow, the 20th. I've corrected the old blog post, but wanted to make another post to make sure the new information got out. Sorry about that!
author: Dan

comments.author: CinemaUntapped
comments.body: Yeah I realized that by accident last night and was relieved that I have tomorrow morning to tweek.  It's awesome!

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Woohoo! We have a great selection this year, I think.
